```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ggplot2)

d = read.csv("city-safety-comparison.csv")

# d$per_cap = d$fatal_total/d$metro_population*100000
d$per_cap = d$fatal_total/d$city_population*100000
```

## Line Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
ggplot(data=d, aes(x=year, y=per_cap, group=city)) + geom_line(aes(linetype=city, color=city))
```
